scripts.acp: git add ./ && git commit -m 'update doc' && git push
scripts.note:new: rm -fr ./packages/note/src/raw/ && cp -r /Users/zhou/Documents/我的坚果云/读书笔记/ ./packages/note/src/raw/
scripts.note:build: pnpm --filter=note docs:build && cp -r ./packages/note/src/.vuepress/dist/ ../note && cd ../note && git add ./ && git commit -m 'update doc' && git push
